name: Push new order to social SW
author: SonWeb

sections.description:
You will be notified new orders quickly and conveniently from Woocommerce to Facebook messenger and Telegram

Variable available in Plugins

  • Your order ID: #%%order_id%%
  • Products name: %%product_name%%
  • First name: %%first_name%%
  • Last name: %%last_name%%
  • Customer email: %%billing_email%%
  • Phone number: %%billing_phone%%
  • Address: %%billing_address%%
  • Total money: %%total%%

You can change Label text to your language example vietname

  • Đơn hàng mới ID: #%%order_id%%
  • Tên sản phẩm: %%product_name%%
  • Họ: %%first_name%%
  • Tên: %%last_name%%
  • Email khách hàng: %%billing_email%%
  • Điện thoại: %%billing_phone%%
  • Địa chỉ: %%billing_address%%
  • Tổng: %%total%%

Features

  • Send new orders from wooccommerce to Facebook messenges
  • Send new orders from wooccommerce to telegram id
  • Messages quickly
  • Convenient to use

From within WordPress

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘New order Notification for Telegram and Facebook’
  3. Activate New order Notification for Telegram and Facebook from your Plugins page.

Manually

  1. Upload the ‘New order Notification for Telegram and Facebook’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the New order Notification for Telegram and Facebook display plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “after activation” below.

Help

https://sonweb.net/plugin-gui-thong-bao-don-hang-moi-woocommerce-telegram.html/
sections.installation:
1. Visit \Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for \New order Notification for Telegram and Facebook\
  3. Activate New order Notification for Telegram and Facebook from your Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with Order Notification for Telegram? Leave a comment in this post.https://sonweb.net/plugin-gui-thong-bao-don-hang-moi-woocommerce-telegram.html/
